name: Flotsam (itch) (pressxtoskip)
description:
You're stranded on a small world with nothing but a rowing boat and a jar of jam. Fluff, soot and jam drive the local economy and, luckily for you, there's free cargo just waiting to be scavenged from the water. But, the sea is littered with mines.

Make enough money to buy that nice little house on the moon, or sink trying.

Arrows to move, mouse for menus. You will float through objects - proper collisions resulted in a nasty bug that we didn't have time to fix :(

Made for Ludum Dare 38 by Stewart Fulford (stock market and balancing), Rob Jaques (art and sound) and Laura Mears (code).
